system.notes: Designed for Exploration. Is sealed, contains sensitive sampling equipment to collect and analyse any material and record such data. Also has built-in Auspex, Vox, Rebreather, and microbead, and lasts one week before recharge. If power failiure, prioritises rebreather and sealing. -10 on Climb, Swim, WSkill, BSskill and Agility Tests whilst worn.
